title: The Book of the SubGenius
description: Sometimes a book goes too far. Sometimes is... now. First, there was The Gilgamesh . Then... the Bhagavad-Gita Then... the Torah, the New Testament, the Koran Then... the Book of Mormon, Dianetics, I'm OK You're OK. And now... The Book of the Subgenius (How to Prosper in the Coming Weird Times)
author: J.R. "Bob" Dobbs
